turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm calling about a package that was supposed to arrive three days ago. The tracking number is 1Z234ABC5678DEF90.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you for providing the tracking number. I'm showing that your package is currently delayed due to unforeseen circumstances. It is now expected to arrive tomorrow. I apologize for the inconvenience.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Unforeseen circumstances? That's what the tracking website said too, but what does that even *mean*? I needed this package for a business meeting today! Is there anything you can do to expedite it or at least tell me *exactly* what the hold up is?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. While I don't have specific details regarding the cause of the delay, I can confirm that the package is currently at our regional distribution center and is scheduled to be loaded onto a delivery vehicle first thing tomorrow morning. I can also offer you a 10% discount on your next shipment as compensation for the delay. Would that be acceptable?
